Mobiles.Name: grull wolf
Mobiles.Long_Description: Grull extends his claws and attacks.
Mobiles.Description:
Grull intends to add your corpse to his
collection.

Mobiles.Name: Thrain
Mobiles.Description:
Thrain is definately the larger of the two
brothers.

Mobiles.Name: Thrynn
Mobiles.Description: Thrynn is the quicker of the two brothers.

Mobiles.Name: Greyback elder
Mobiles.Long_Description: Greyback the Lupine Elder stands here.
Mobiles.Description:
Greyback is covered with scars from thousands
of fights.

Mobiles.Name: were wolf werewolf
Mobiles.Description: This wolf is small and weak.

Mobiles.Name: were wolf werewolf
Mobiles.Long_Description: A werewolf looks for your weaknesses.
Mobiles.Description:
This wolf-man stands 8 foot tall and has
long, sharp claws.

Mobiles.Name: wolf cub wolfcub
Mobiles.Long_Description: This young cub is frightened by your presence.
Mobiles.Description: The wolfcub looks back at you!

Mobiles.Name: lupine
Mobiles.Long_Description: A dark Lupine stand before you.
Mobiles.Description: You feel razors rip through your flesh.

Mobiles.Name: mongrel
Mobiles.Long_Description: A mongrel seem to have escaped destruction.

Mobiles.Name: dragon
Mobiles.Long_Description: A Dragon sentinel stands here, guarding the path.
Mobiles.Description: This dragon was enslaved by the ancient Wyrm.

Objects.Name: flea
Objects.Description: This flea is looking for another host.

Objects.Name: stone whetsone rock
Objects.Description: This whetstone was used to sharpen Grull's claws.

Objects.Name: fur cloak
Objects.Description: A pile of fur lies here.

Objects.Name: ring
Objects.Description: A small round  object lies here.

Rooms.Name: A hill overlooking the dark forest
Rooms.Description:
From atop this hill you can see in all
directions.  You hear horrible howls in the
distance.

Rooms.Name: Before the Wolfden
Rooms.Description:
From this bluff you notice strange things
in the distance.

Rooms.Name: A clearing
Rooms.Description: This clearing has exits in all directions.

Rooms.Name: A thicket
Rooms.Description:
The forest has grown over thickly here. You
smell an unfamiliar stench.

Rooms.Name: A thicket
Rooms.Description:
The forest has grown over thickly here. You
smell an unfamiliar stench.

Rooms.Name: A thicket
Rooms.Description:
The forest has grown over thickly here. You
smell an unfamiliar stench.

Rooms.Name: A thicket
Rooms.Description:
The forest has grown over thickly here. You
smell an unfamiliar stench.

Rooms.Name: A Smelly Cavern
Rooms.Description:
This small opening is dark and wet. You can
feel the fleas jumping onto your body. All 
of the exits look the same.

Rooms.Name: The Center of the Den
Rooms.Description:
You are now certain you are in a fortress
controlled by Garou forces.

Rooms.Name: The Exterior Walls
Rooms.Description:
The walls of this dwelling are covererd
with pictures illustrating Lupine history.

Rooms.Name: The Exterior Walls
Rooms.Description:
The walls of this dwelling are covererd
with pictures illustrating Lupine history.

Rooms.Name: Stairwell of Death
Rooms.Description: These steps lead up to certain death.

Rooms.Name: Stairwell of Death
Rooms.Description: These steps lead up to certain death.

Rooms.Name: A Central Opening
Rooms.Description: This rooms is covered with blood.

Rooms.Name: The Uppermost Level
Rooms.Description:
This is the top level of this werewolf
camp.  You can sense the presence of very
powerful lupines.

Rooms.Name: The Outlook
Rooms.Description:
You can see the remains of a path to the 
east.  You wonder where it went.

Rooms.Name: Greyback's Chamber
Rooms.Description:
You've found Greyback's Chamber.  You can see
the remains of dozens of skulls lining the
walls.

Rooms.Name: Thrynn's Chamber
Rooms.Description:
This chamber is the domicile of one of the
twin wolves.

Rooms.Name: Thrain's Chamber
Rooms.Description:
This chamber is the domicile of one of the
twin wolves.

Rooms.Name: Grull's Chamber
Rooms.Description:
Grull, the dark messenger, stand before you.
His claws are stained from the blood of many
slain enemies.
